    • Field Detail

      • timestamp

        public final long timestamp

        The time when the event occurred. (read-only)

      • trackingAreaSize

        public final inair.utils.SizeF trackingAreaSize

        The tracking area size when the event occurred. (read-only)

        It should be the size of remote control device's screen. However, for events that are not touch-based (like shake events...), this property is ignored. InAir applications use this property extensively to determine the side of which the event occurred. For example, within a UILayeredNavigationView, a vertical swipe event can trigger two different actions. If it occurred in the haft left of the remote control device screen, it triggers layer changed. Otherwise, it triggers scroll event.

    • Constructor Detail
